info.title: Video Indexer (V2)
info.description: Easily extract insights from your videos and quickly enrich your applications to enhance discovery and engagement. Use the Video Indexer connector to turn your videos into insights.

get.description: Gets an account access token (expires after an hour).
This operation returns the details of the user's accounts.
This operation gets a list of all videos in the account.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of pages to skip.

200.description: The list of videos in the account.

post.description:
This operation uploads the given video, starts indexing it, and returns a new video index ID.
The supported formats are listed here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/media-services/media-services-media-encoder-standard-formats).

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Metadata to associate with the video (will be returned in queries).

parameters.name: videoUrl
parameters.description: A public URL of the video/audio file (URL encoded). If not specified, the file should be passed as a multipart/form body content.

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The uploaded file name.

parameters.name: linguisticModelId
parameters.description: Linguistic model ID as received by 'create linguistic model' call.

parameters.name: externalUrl
parameters.description: An external URL to associate with the video (can be searched for later).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: If a video URL is not specified, the file should be passed as a multipart/form body content.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: Azure media services asset id. Used to index from existing assets in your connected Azure media services account. (Paid only).

get.description: This operation gets a video and its insights.

200.description: The list of videos in the account.

get.description: This operation performs a search for text, keywords, and visual content.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Free text to search for.

parameters.name: textScope
parameters.description: The text scope to search in.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A video ID to search for.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: A video owner to search for.

parameters.name: face
parameters.description: Search for people or celebrities.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of results to skip (used for paging).

delete.description: This operation deletes the specified video and all related insights found when the video was indexed.
This operation deletes the video source file, but does not delete the insights found when the video was indexed.

get.description: This operation returns the details of the user's account.

put.description: This operation re-indexes the given video.

parameters.name: sourceLanguage
parameters.description: The language to set set as the source language of the video, to be used when generating the transcript.

get.summary: Get Video ID by External ID
get.description: This operation retrieves the video ID corresponding to the external ID.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: The external ID.

put.description: This operation updates the name of the given face and trains the face model to recognize that face in future videos.

parameters.name: faceId
parameters.description: The face ID.

parameters.name: newName
parameters.description: A new name for the face.

get.description: This operation returns the captions extracted when the video was indexed.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The captions format (e.g. vtt).

200.description: The captions extracted when the video was indexed.

get.description: Get thumbnail image of a video.

parameters.name: thumbnailId
parameters.description: The thumbnail ID.

put.description: Updates the transcript of the video.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The transcript to update.

parameters.name: setAsSourceLanguage
parameters.description: Determines whether the language parameter should be set as source language.

parameters.name: sendSuccessEmail
parameters.description: Determines whether to send a success email upon completion.

externalId.description: The external ID associated with the video.

lastModified.description: When the video was last modified.

lastIndexed.description: When the video was last indexed.

privacyMode.description: The privacy mode of the video (public or private).

userName.description: The username of the video owner.

isOwned.description: Indicates whether the video is owned by the user who made the call.

isBase.description: Indicates whether the video is a base video.

state.description: The processing state of the video. (Uploaded / Processing / Processed / Failed / Quarantined).

processingProgress.description: Progress percentage of the video, if itâ€™s being processed.

durationInSeconds.description: The duration of the video in seconds.

thumbnailVideoId.description: The ID of the video containing the original thumbnail.

searchMatches.description: Search matches and their details (json string).

indexingPreset.description: The indexing preset of the video index.

streamingPreset.description: The streaming preset of the video index.

sourceLanguage.description: The source language of the video.

pageSize.description: Page size of the search results.

skip.description: Number of results to skip (used for paging).

done.description: Indicates whether the search is done.

userName.description: The username of the video owner.

created.description: The creation time of the video.

privacyMode.description: The privacy mode of the video.

state.description: The processing state of the video. (Uploaded / Processing / Processed / Failed / Quarantined).

isOwned.description: Indicates whether the video is owned by a user.

isEditable.description: Whether the request to get the video had a token with write permission.

isBase.description: Indicates whether the video is a base video.

durationInSeconds.description: The duration of the video in seconds.

summarizedInsights.description: Summary of insights taken from the video index (json string).

videos.description: Videos insights taken from the video index (json string).

videosRanges.description: The ranges of the videos in this index (json string).

url.description: API calls should be made to account URL + account location.

allowEdit.name: allowEdit
allowEdit.description: Determines whether the token has write permissions.

accountId.name: accountId
accountId.description: Account ID is a globally unique identifier (GUID) for the account.

location.name: location
location.description: Indicates the Azure region to which the call should be routed.

accountReadAccessToken.name: accessToken
accountReadAccessToken.description: An account access token with read permissions.

accountWriteAccessToken.name: accessToken
accountWriteAccessToken.description: An account access token with write permissions.

partition.name: partition
partition.description: A partition to search videos by.

externalId.name: externalId
externalId.description: An external ID (associated with the video at upload).

videoLanguage.name: language
videoLanguage.description: The video language, used when generating the transcript.

searchLanguage.name: language
searchLanguage.description: The search language. You can specify multiple language parameters (e.g. $language=English&language=French) to search multiple languages. Leaving this parameter blank will search all languages.

sourceLanguage.name: sourceLanguage
sourceLanguage.description: Include only videos with the specified source language. You can specify multiple language parameters (e.g. $language=English&language=French) to search multiple languages. Leaving this parameter blank will search all languages.

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description: The number of results to return.

callbackUrl.name: callbackUrl
callbackUrl.description:
A URL to notify when indexing is complete.
It should be a POST URL and Video Indexer will add 2 additional query string parameters to it: ID and state.

priority.name: priority
priority.description: Index priority (Low, Normal and High). Can be used in paid regions only.

brandsCategories.name: brandsCategories
brandsCategories.description: List of brands categories delimited by comma. Video indexer will only take these categories in to account when indexing. If not specified all brands will be used.
